import React , { Component } from 'react'; import BillDetails from './BillDetails' class ServiceDt extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ serPer: 0, cName: '', tipCal: 0, totalTip: 0, custCount: 0, listItems: [{name:'',tip:0}] } } render () { const {serPer , cName , tipCal , totalTip , custCount } = this.state return( <>
How was the service ?

Customer Name : {this.setState({cName: event.target.value , listItems: [...this.state.listItems,{name : this.state.cName, tip : this.state.tipCal }], tipCal: this.props.bAmt * this.state.serPer})}} required />

Tip Amount :Rs

) } } export default ServiceDt;
